short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build and parse Visual Crossing Weather API requests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Weather API Request Builder provides a simple way to construct, modify and verify Visual Crossing Weather API requests. 

Start with an existing Weather API request and the extension will analyze the request parameters including location, date range, API key and other properties. You can then modify the parameters to test various requests.

If a sample API request does not include a valid API key, the extension will automatically replace the key with your personal saved key so you can submit the request

For more information on the Visual Crossing Weather API, please see https://www.visualcrossing.com/weather-api
